name: stamp
explanation: When the artifact was first discovered

name: valid
explanation: Whether the artifact is valid (used for invalidations)

name: x
explanation: Robot /map frame x coordinate of localization point

name: y
explanation: Robot /map frame y coordinate of localization point

name: z
explanation: Robot /map frame z coordinate of localization point

name: report_id
explanation: Unique ID for this artifact, consistent across time

name: images
explanation: Images to support the detection, if any
